description: Discover ZeroBot, the internet's voice-enabled chatbot. Engage with AI agents designed for specific roles, and experience a new way to communicate. Connect anytime, anywhere with the perfect virtual companion for your needs.
title: ZeroBot - Internet's #1 verbal chatbot
introduction: Meet ZeroBot, the Internet's #1 voice-enabled chatbot! Imagine having a conversation with a computer friend who talks with you just like a real person. With ZeroBot, it's not just typing – it's talking! Get ready to chat in a whole new way. Now with the Groq LPU™ Inference Engine for the world's fastest inference speed for LLMs via the alpha version of Groq API, your chats are instant and effortlessly smooth.
features: Uses Groq LPU™ Inference Engine for fast inference speed
AI agents available for various needs (Tutor, Counselor, Buddy, Doctor)
targetPeople: General users looking for a conversational AI experience

faqs.question: What is ZeroBot?
faqs.answer: ZeroBot is the Internet's #1 voice-enabled chatbot that allows you to have conversations just like with a real person.

faqs.question: What technology does ZeroBot use?
faqs.answer: ZeroBot uses the Groq LPU™ Inference Engine for the world's fastest inference speed for LLMs via the alpha version of Groq API.

faqs.question: What types of AI agents are available?
faqs.answer: ZeroBot offers AI agents such as Tutor, Counselor, Buddy, and Doctor.
